title: 106: Ayurvedic Herbal Healing with Dr. Virender Sodhi, Youveda Advisory Member
itunes:title: 106: Ayurvedic Herbal Healing with Dr. Virender Sodhi, Youveda Advisory Member
description:
I am so privileged to have some of the most educated Ayurvedic doctors on the planet on Highest Self Podcast and Dr. Sodhi is one of them.

Father of Gunny, the founder of Youveda, he is the one that put together the formula of herbs that took his son out a deep, dark depression after the tragic loss of his 16-year-old brother.

Together, this family created Youveda, a company that is changing people’s lives on the daily, with Ayurveda and modern science.

In this episode, we discuss:
-Ayurveda from an herbal perspective
-Balancing your dual Dosha
-Dr. Sodhi’s unique perspective that turmeric should not be heated

Use code “sahara” to receive 35% your Youveda supplements over at www.youveda.com

Be part of a community that supports you discovering your dharma in Rose Gold Goddesses, the sacred sisterhood collective with community, content, creativity and so much more — learn more about rosegoldgoddesses.com.

Receive 15% off Four Sigmatic at foursigmatic.com with code "sahara"

Join my Awaken Your Powers Masterclass to become a leader in the new paradigm with Shaman Durek: https://www.iamsahararose.com/awaken-your-powers


Intro + Outro Music: Silent Ganges by Maneesh de Moor

Discover your Dosha and receive custom results for your mind and body with my free quiz at eatfeelfresh.com/new-quiz

Connect with me for daily Ayurvedic and modern spiritual wisdom at: Instagram.com/iamsahararose
Facebook.com/iamsahararose Twitter.com/iamsahararose

Order My Books Eat Feel Fresh + Idiot's Guide to Ayurveda: https://www.iamsahararose.com/books
